data.name: Tanks in Labyrinth
data.detailed_description:
Tanks in Labyrinth - is an cool indie game where you control a tank and fight against other players in a small labyrinth.
The game has a lot of interesting bonuses:
  • Hammer
    A hammer that destroys walls.
  • Rocket
    Guided rocket.
  • Machinegun
    A machine gun that can fire 20 bullets at once.
  • Blast
    A bullet that explodes when the shot button is pressed again, or after a certain time.
  • Wall
    A wall that can be put up, but after a while it will be destroyed.
  • Portal
    Teleports to a random location.

The game has a lot of interesting bonuses:

data.short_description: Tanks in Labyrinth is a fun multiplayer game where you play as a tank. Every man for himself. The fight takes place in a labyrinth. You can play with a top view, or you can play from the first person! Interesting bonuses: hammer, machinegun, explosion, wall, portal.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
